block.p: CITIGROUP, New York, named Michael Carpenter to head investment and corporate banking in North America, Europe and Japan. Victor Menezes, who had previously overseen the units with Mr. Carpenter, was named to run consumer and corporate businesses in emerging markets.
EDEL MUSIC A.G., Hamburg, Germany, named Ron Urban president and chief executive at its North American unit. He had been senior vice president at Sony Music and Entertainment.

CITIGROUP, New York, named Michael Carpenter to head investment and corporate banking in North America, Europe and Japan. Victor Menezes, who had previously overseen the units with Mr. Carpenter, was named to run consumer and corporate businesses in emerging markets.
EDEL MUSIC A.G., Hamburg, Germany, named Ron Urban president and chief executive at its North American unit. He had been senior vice president at Sony Music and Entertainment.
MARIMBA, Mountain View, Calif., named John Olsen chief executive, succeeding Kim Polese, who will remain with the company as chairman and chief strategy officer.
